description.value:
You create a puff of colorful smoke that quickly disperses while you become temporarily @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures unless they can see invisible creatures. You Stride. At the end of your movement, if you have cover, greater cover, or concealment, attempt a @Check[type:stealth|traits:action:hide] check to Hide. You gain a +2 status bonus to this Stealth check. The invisibility then ends, and you either become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to creatures as determined by your check to Hide, if you made one.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4vlorajqpFcS5Ozi]{Spell Effect: Flashy Disappearance}
